Subject: Destination Details field is empty even if the DPI is turned ON
Description:
Hello,

Customer name is PrivatBank.
They have encountered the issue when the Destination Details field is empty even if the DPI is turned ON.
The EPP client is Ubuntu 24.04 version 2.4.4.1. When the CAP policy is triggered, the Destination Details field in the Reports and Analysis menu is empty.
Could you please clarify what could cause this issue?
Attaching screenshots.
What_We_Know__c:
- destination details is empty on Ubuntu
- fix for this targeted for 5950
- informed the customer about this
- reporting V2 is enabled
Next_Steps__c: waiting on the customer to further test
